description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: 'Yahoo! JAPAN' App for Android v2.3.1 to v3.161.1 and 'Yahoo! JAPAN' App for iOS v3.2.2 to v4.109.0 contain a cross-site scripting vulnerability. If this vulnerability is exploited, an arbitrary script may be executed on the WebView of 'Yahoo! JAPAN' App via other app installed on the user's device.
